com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview

Class UtilitiesPoint2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview.UtilitiesPoint2D

  • public class UtilitiesPoint2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with utility methods for Point2D instances and force-based layout computations.

        Computes the vector of the attractive force between two nodes.

        to - Coordinates of the second node
